name: wecom
description: 通过 Webhook 向企业微信群发送消息（文本、Markdown、图文卡片）

webhookUrl.label: Webhook URL (从企业微信群机器人设置中获取)

tools.name: wecom_send_text
tools.description: Send a text message to a WeCom group chat. Supports @mentioning members by userId or mobile number.

args.mentioned_list: string[] (optional) — list of userIds to @mention, use ["@all"] to mention everyone
args.mentioned_mobile_list: string[] (optional) — list of mobile numbers to @mention

tools.name: wecom_send_markdown
tools.description: Send a Markdown-formatted message to a WeCom group chat. Supports bold, links, quotes, colored text etc.

tools.name: wecom_send_news
tools.description: Send a news/card message with title, description, link and optional image to a WeCom group chat.

args.title: string — card title
args.url: string — link URL when card is clicked
args.picurl: string (optional) — image URL for the card
